Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-3651 affecting package python-idna for versions less than 3.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-3651 affecting package python-idna for versions less than 3.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-idna is earlier than 3.7-1, affected by CVE-2024-3651
